name: Fine Stall: Splash of Color
description: Huts built around the square by vendors during the Lantern Rite Festival. The frames are made from dry Sandbearer Wood and decorated with a red roof and curtains. These huts are often used to sell souvenirs and gifts. Liyue has a tradition of giving gifts at the door, and these huts are always crowded with customers around the time of the Lantern Rite Festival.
